roleset.name: speak
roleset.note: TALK-V NOTES: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls lecture-37.11-1, talk-37.5. (from talk.01-v)
TALK-N NOTES: Roleset based on talk.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie (from talk.01-n)

example.name: no hearer
example.text: We're talking about years ago before anyone heard of asbestos having any questionable properties.
example.arg: about years ago before anyone heard of asbestos having any questionable properties

example.name: no subject
example.text: Cray says it is talking with several prospects.

example.name: both
example.text: Mr. Simonds-Gooding isn't talking to any studios about investing.

example.name: Example with all args
example.text: its steel talks with the U.S.

example.name: Slightly different arg 0 use
example.text: talk among Republicans that maybe Conrad Burns would find something else to do maybe in the Bush administration
example.arg: that maybe Conrad Burns would find something else to do maybe in the Bush administration

roleset.name: persuade / dissuade; talk into or out of
roleset.note: TALK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls force-59-1. VN, FN Updated by Julia (from talk.02-v)

example.name: dissuade
example.text: [Mr. Ross]-1 tried *trace*-1 to talk him out of letting Sony buy CBS Records.
example.arg: out of letting Sony buy CBS Records

example.name: less an action than a state
example.text: Although the board believed that [Mr. Icahn]-2 is more interested in [*-2]talking the stock price higher than acquiring USX, it adopted a poison-pill defense, to be swallowed if anyone amasses a 15% stake.

roleset.name: talk it out: talk to the point of resolution
roleset.note: TALK_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. 0 (from talk.03-v)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: It is Ren Zhiqiang who encouraged you to speculate in real estate . You-1 should go to Ren Zhiqiang *PRO*-1 to talk it out .
